title: The server issues on OCE are ridiculous.
body: I mean honestly, can one day go by without the server spazzing out?

replies.body: servers being shit after every patch somehow ,i don't know understand how they do but every time riots f's something up.. now its constant dc from client!!! WHATS UP RIOT? fixing it ?
Im betting its your machine or ISP.. Servers are always stable for me.
I just got on like 10 minutes ago and i've disconnected from the client like 4 times already, fuck is goin on?

Indeed, and people wonder why I don't bother with Ranked on this server.
